mapper.insert: insert into video (name, area, type, language, introduce, score, mid, location, release, update, downcount) values(#{name}, #{area}, #{type}, #{language}, #{introduce}, #{score}, #{mid}, #{location}, #{release}, #{update}, #{downcount})
mapper.update: update video set name=#{name}, area=#{area}, type=#{type}, language=#{language}, introduce=#{introduce}, score=#{score}, mid=#{mid}, location=#{location}, release=#{release}, update=#{update}, downcount=#{downcount} where vid=#{vid}
mapper.select: select * from video where name like "%"#{key}"%"
